mapper.insert: insert into USERS(user_id, password, user_name, email, user_tel, user_resp, address) values(#{userId},#{passWord},#{userName},#{email},#{userTel},#{userResp},#{address})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE user_id = #{userId}
select * from users order by user_id
mapper.update: update users set password = #{passWord}, user_name = #{userName}, email = #{email}, user_tel = #{userTel}, address = #{address} where user_id = #{userId}
